summary_table = pd.DataFrame({"Unique Items": unique_items,
                              "Average Price": [average],

summary_table["Total Revenue"] = summary_table["Total Revenue"].map("$ {:,}".format)

summary_table2 = pd.DataFrame({"Purchase Count": total_gender,
                              "Average Purchase Price": [male_average_pp, female_average_pp, other_average_pp],
                              "Total Purchase Value": [male_TPV, female_TPV, other_TPV],
                              "Avg Total Purchase per Person": [male_ATPPP, female_ATPPP, other_ATPPP]})

summary_table2["Average Purchase Price"] = summary_table2["Average Purchase Price"].map("$ {:.2f}".format)
summary_table2["Total Purchase Value"] = summary_table2["Total Purchase Value"].map("$ {:,}".format)
summary_table2["Avg Total Purchase per Person"] = summary_table2["Avg Total Purchase per Person"].map("$ {:.2f}".format)
summary_table2
